description:
Kaname Sakura is the only daughter born into the family that runs the Kaname Dojo on Tatsumiya Island.
Her mother, Kiyomi, is a P.E teacher, and her father Seiichiro was a powerful martial artist who was killed in the first assault of the Festum - much to Sakura`s dismay. She now fights against the Festum to continue what her father left behind him.
name: Kaname Sakura
